snippet.title: "The Incredible Shrinking Character Game" intro, Go-Go Studios, 1995
snippet.description:
This cinematic represents a team effort in 1995.  It utilized 486's, 3d Studio (DOS version 3) and Deluxe Paint.  For this game I built 3d characters (modified from the "Humanoid" mesh), 3d environments, modified the Viewpoint 57 Chevy from convertible to hardtop, animated the characters, rotoscoped and composited elements, controlled lighting and timing of all animated elements and edited the final project.

I did not create the ant or animate it, or the mansion itself.

Ken Thomson Jr.
